channel.title: Project One V2!
channel.description:
[img]http://www.photoshack.com/albums/userpics/13011/138259430946316073.gif[/img]
hey guys!, i have had quiet a few enquiry's about Project One lately and it has inspired me to drag the server (hosted version) from my HDD and i am currently starting too make a V2!!
Base as always is going to be PI
[u]GOALS[/u] my goals for this server are to create a great server for all you people out there, i will be releasing it as i did previously
[u]Updates[/u] i will be locating and fixing bugs and glitches.. creating a better training zone.. add more customs.. add full screen option.. better home.. fix xp rates (you level up too fast) add more NPC.. add construction (not like Deathly PvPz, like original RS) and much more!!!!!!!!
will update this as i go along thanks :)

item.title: Project One V2!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“williams15, post:7, topic:541287”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=660161.msg4414316#msg4414316 date=1395108087]

i will be updating it as i go along… it will eventually reach these “standards” of yours

they’re pretty basic standards so I don’t get what you’re implying
[/quote]

it a development thread its not meant to look perfect straight up, what part of “il edit this thread as i go along” doesnt anyone understand… if i have to expand on it then here; I WILL UPDATE THE THREAD WITH IMAGES AND TIDY IT UP AND MAKE IT LOOK BETTER AS I PROGRESS! [/quote]

4) New topics: You must post at least a few pictures of your Development. If you do not, we cannot believe you. You may substitute this with a video. Why pictures/video? So you have proof you did something. Also, topic titles must follow this.
  1. Projects: This is not the place to post minor projects, such as, changing spawn locations, adding a few commands then saying you will release. We want something more major than that, seeing as all you do to change spawn locations is change a number and you’re done. We don’t want to see that you can change a number, we want to see that you can create something that will change the server in such a way that it’ll make it funner and more enjoyable for the players, or that you can change the game code to make it more efficient at doing a certain task or to have more stability overall.

not trying to piss you off, just stating that the rules are the rules…

all I’m saying is update the thread with a few pictures and a more developed explanation. good luck

Read full topic

wowo cool bro!! THANKS :eek: :eek:
wheres download link?

shut up faggot.
[hr]
OP: let make this clear.

[ol][li]If you will make a simple PI with edited shops and npc spawns, please don’t bother post a thread.[/li]
[li]Supply pictures.[/li]
[li]Organize your text, make groups.[/li]
[li]Explain your future goals and how you will exceed them. [/li][/ol]

[/quote]
I hope so.

i will be updating it as i go along… it will eventually reach these “standards” of yours[/quote]
